Class Colony

  • java.lang.Object
    • logic.Colony
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class Colony
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    A 2D boolean array implementation of a colony.
    Author:
    Soheil Koushan
